titles.title: Directing the Secretary of Health and Human Services to propose to the Congress, not later than May 18, 1994, possible solutions to the impending deficit in the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H348-350)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2622)

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 2/8/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to study and report to the Congress on the factors threatening the solvency of the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund and proposing possible solutions.
